intro: Psychotria insolens, commonly known as the red-eyed poison dart frog, is a striking tropical plant native to Central and South America. It is characterized by its dark green leaves and striking red flowers with prominent yellow markings. The plant belongs to the Rubiaceae family and is often found in humid, shaded understory environments. Its flowers attract various pollinators, including bees and butterflies. The plant is also notable for its role in traditional medicine and its association with the venomous frogs that share its habitat.
